questions.title: For whom this course is suitable?
questions.text:
1. The course is suitable for those who do not know where to start. What is IT? In this course, you will pass the basic experience in different roles from the IT field, which will allow you to understand the whole picture and confidently move on with your choice.

2. Do you want to start educating IT field, but are afraid? Don't have "special" talent which others do? - There is no difference in working in IT or working as loader or checkout salesperson. In all 3 cases, there is a work schedule and it will be difficult at the begining to use to. But then its just a work.

questions.title: How is the education going?
questions.text:
1. The student receives the task one by one as he completes.

2. Education takes place in 2 stages. In the first, the student tries different IT roles by personal experience. On the second, gaining knowledge and experience in the specialty that you liked the most.

questions.title: How do we help with work?
questions.text: Consultancy all the way of creating a cv and job interviewing. The final assignment of the course is to create a resume and get a job. Only by finishing this task means that the course is completed for the student.

questions.title: What are the advanteges?
questions.text:
Mentoring is the most effective learning method. Studying with a mentor, the students solve problems on their own, while the mentor guides the student in the right direction and can give professional answers to the questions that arise.

Community support, sharing of the experience and learning difficulties, that will appear really helpful for a future specialist in any field. The manager's confidence in his employees - in the ability to solve problems on their own, take responsibility, make decisions based on BestPractice, perform the work without the need for step-by-step instructions - perfectly distinguishes the specialist from his colleagues.Such a learning method is much more effective than lecture courses or just tasks which are supposed to be solved without any help.

materials.title: Unlimited access
materials.text: You get unlimited access to all materials

employment.title: 100% employment
employment.text: Result-orientation and support at the stage of employment

cost.title: Whatever payment you see fit
cost.text: There’s no a certain payment for the service. Pay as much as you think is appropriate anytime you like
